message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40.
I think we can be more fair, Alice. Let's split it 60/40 with me getting the larger share this time.  We can work out a better deal later.
Bob, this deal needs to be worthwhile for both of us. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need more than that.
Alice, let's be reasonable. Inflation is hurting us both, but I'm willing to split it 55/45 in your favor.  We can't keep rejecting each other's offers - we'll both lose too much money.
